title: AIS vessel
description: Data of a specific vessel communicated through one or several types of AIS messages.

mmsi.title: MMSI
mmsi.description: MMSI number of the AIS transceiver.

class.title: class
class.description: Class of the AIS transceiver, defined by the AIS messages communicating the data of the vessel (A: messages 1,2,3, and 5; B: messages 18, 19, and 24).

sog.title: SOG
sog.description: Speed Over Ground of the vessel [knots].

cog.title: COG
cog.description: Course Over Ground of the vessel with respect to True North [radians]

position_accuracy.title: Position accuracy
position_accuracy.description: Accuracy of the position (high <= 10 meters; low > 10 meters).
